text: Ariya Gulite also written as Arija Gulite (Russian: Ария Гулите, born April 1941 or 1942) is a former Soviet long track speed skater, who was active in the 1960s. Gulite represented her nation at the World Allround Speed Skating Championships for Women in 1962, finishing 8th overall. She also competed at other international competitions. Between 1960 and 1964 she competed four times at the Soviet Allround Championships. == Records== === Personal records === ==References== Category:1940s births Category:Place of birth missing (living people) Category:Date of birth missing (living people) Category:Soviet female speed skaters Category:Living people
title: Ariya Gulite
